data.title: Umbra: All Legends of the Sea Locations
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Umbra: All Legends of the Sea Locations page of the official IGN Wiki Guide and Walkthrough for Sea of Thieves. Here, we'll list the
data.text: Legend of the Sea Location Where to Find It Image Delicious Delivery Morrow's Peak Outpost On top of a small crate (in a group of three total crates) by the Merchant Alliance representative here Hallowed Ground Ferry of the Damned (you need to die to reach this) Right before leaving the ferry (through the teal-lit exit under the wheel on deck), look to the right and you'll see Hallowed Ground on the pillar A Hairy Legacy Anywhere — Go to Umbra Talk to Umbra while wearing the Legacy Beard facial hair. It can be purchased for 150 Gold Charitable Pirating Anywhere — Go to Umbra Talk to Umbra while wearing the Stream Sailor makeup cosmetic. It can be purchased for 450 Gold Pirate Leg End Anywhere — Go to Umbra Talk to Umbra while wearing the Sea Dog Peg Leg. It can be purchased for 4050 Gold Purple Pretty Anywhere — Go to Umbra Talk to Umbra while wearing the Amethyst Angel Hair Dye. It can be purchased by 1995 Gold Legends of the Sea 1 Devil's Ridge Head to the Devil's Ridge and climb to the top of the main circle of rocks. Up here, head south until you see a large rock sticking up. You'll find the journal up here. Legends of the Sea 2 Crescent Isle On the southern end of Crescent Isle, you'll find three barrels and the skeleton of what looks like an old rowboat or wagon. You'll find the journal here. Legends of the Sea 3 The Devil's Thirst Head to the eastern side of The Devil's Thirst and look for the abandoned ship on shore. Inside, you'll find an opened crate next to a barrel with a crate on top of it. The journal is inside the open crate. Legends of the Sea 4 The Crooked Masts Head to The Crooked Masts and climb to the very top — it's the brazier beacon that you're looking for. You'll find the journal lodged between a wooden piece of the ship and the rock beneath the ship. Legends of the Seas 5 Kraken's Fall Head to the southeast side of the island and look for the massive Kraken skeleton. Inside the skeleton, you'll find the journal on a piece of bone. Legends of the Sea 6 Pirate Legends Hideout You cannot access this Hideout unless you're a pirate legend or in a crew with someone that is a pirate legend. Inside the hideout, you'll find the journal on a shelf on the wall. Legends of the Sea 7 Hidden Spring Keep Head to the southwest side of the island and climb up the wooden tower. Overlooking the fort, look for the lit brazier and you'll find the journal right next to it. Legends of the Sea 8 Shipwreck Bay Head to Shipwreck Bay and look for the wrecked Blackwyche ship. Inside the captain's quarter, you'll find a red chair made of wood. This journal can be found underneath the chair. Legends of the Sea 9 Wild Treasures Store Head to the store of the Wild Treasures Store and you'll find this journal underneath a hammock hanging by a brazier. Legends of the Sea 10 Fort of the Damned Head to the Fort of the Damned and climb the second tallest tower. You'll find the journal up here. The Fox in the Snake Dagger Tooth Outpost Head into the tavern on Dagger Tooth and you'll find it to the left of the bar. Missing, Presumed Pirating Lone Cove Head to the southwest side of the middle of Lone Cove and look for a wooden tunnel of sorts (above land). You'll find a piece of paper nailed to one of the wooden beams. Self-Promoting Pistol Pirate Dagger Tooth Outpost Head to the Weapon shop here and you'll find a poster nailed to a wooden beam beside it. Join the Club Mermaid's Hideaway Head to Mermaid's Hideaway at go to the highest point of the island's south side. You'll find a large, wooden structure up here and a poster nailed to one of its wooden beams. Nice to be Wanted Wanderer's Refuge Head to Wanderer's Refuge and climb to the highest point of it, right in the middle of the island. You'll find a poster nailed to a vertical piece of wood that looks like it used to be part of a wall. Sleeping with the Fishes Mermaid's Hideaway Head to the northeast side of this island and you'll find a skeleton with its hand on a rock. Look at the name it's carving into the rock to find this legend. Aim High Plunder Outpost Head to Plunder Outpost and on the Eastern Side, you need to shoot yourself up to a small cliff on the main mountain. Up here, you'll find the legend. ...And Not a Drop Spilled Ancient Spire Outpost Head to this outpost and look at the large plaque above the entrance door. Not All Falcons Fly Shipwreck Bay Head to Shipwreck Bay and go to the Blackwyche shipwreck. You'll find a skeleton buried in the ground just outside of it. The skeleton is the legend. Run Aground Salty Sands Head to the south of Salty Sands and look for a large rock with a painting on it. The painting shows three people on a ship harpooning what appears to be the Megalodon. This painting is the legend. Not Just For Sweeping Sanctuary Outpost Head to the tavern on this island and look above the entrance — the legend is the "George Kraken" sign located here. Bound By a Book Smuggler's Bay Head to Smuggler's Bay and enter the cave here. Look for five candles on top of a rock in this cave. The legend, which is a book, is surrounded by these candles. Snake Charmer Snake Island Head to Snake Island and look for the large snake shrine in the middle. You'll find a snake basket on it and inside is the legend. Dog Days Mermaid's Hideaway Head to Mermaid's Hideaway and go to the campsite here. You'll find a wooden sign leaning on a rock and on the sign is a picture of a dog. That's the legend. Pirate Port Pals Golden Sands Outpost Head to the tavern here and just outside of it on a table, you'll find two tankards. Inspect them to learn of the legend. Death by Banana Marauder's Arch Head into the tunnel on this island and right as you reach the exit (with the large wooden structure out in the water), you'll find a banana eating a skeleton. ZZ Marks the Spot Plunder Outpost Head into the tavern here and being the bar, on a piece of wood near the lantern, you'll find a small plaque. This plaque is the legend. Going Bananas Sanctuary Outpost Head to the north side of this outpost and look for two barrels behind a large rock. The barrel with the bananas painted on it is the legend. Famously Frugal Lost Gold Fort Head to this fort and once in the lower, arena-like portion of the island, look for a wooden building with a lantern hanging down. You'll find a poster nailed to a wooden beam here and this poster is the legend. Wide of the Mark Smuggler's Bay Head to the top of Smuggler's Bay and look for a small piece of wood that's actually six pieces of wood leaning up on a rock. There's a target leaning on the wooden and above it is a name — that name is the legend. Precision Pirating Galleon's Grave Outpost Head to the Galleon's Grave Outpost and look for the white and red target hanging by chain. Interact with the target to satisfy this legend. Legendary Larceny Smuggler's Bay Head up the shore and somewhat deep into the island. On a large rock surrounded by other large rocks, you'll see a painting on a rock and this painting is the legend. Buckets of Fun Sanctuary Outpost Head to the Sanctuary Outpost and go to the shipwright's post here. In front of their post, you'll find a bucket nailed to a wooden beam and this bucket is what you must interact with to satisfy this legend. A Venomous Attack Shark Fin Camp Head to the Shark Fin Camp and once there, look for the wooden gate-like structure. You'll see a painting of what appears to be a skeleton on this gate-like structure. This painting is the legend. A Musical Family Ancient Spire Outpost Head here and interact with the violin on the floor of the equipment store. Still Life Sanctuary Outpost Head into the Sanctuary Outpost tavern and on the left wall, you'll find a painting of kraken tentacles sticking out of the ocean. This painting is the legend. Dressed to Impress Ancient Spire Outpost Head into the Ancient Spire Outpost tavern and on the left is a painting of four pirates. Interact with this painting. Through The Eyes of a Child Smuggler's Bay Head to Smuggler's Bay and look for the small camp in the middle of the island. You'll find a picture sitting on a bench. Interact with it. Pirates in Portrait Sailor's Bounty Head to Sailor's Bounty and look for the camp on the west side of the camp. Here, you'll find a painting underneath the makeshift wooden tent. Interact with it. Merrick Roll The Reaper's Hideout Head to the western island of The Reaper's Hideout and look for the wooden triangular structure. Underneath it is a book. Read the entire book to satisfy this legend. One Cross Pirate Sanctuary Outpost Head to the southern end of this outpost and look for a sack of papers sitting on some wood. Interact with the sack to satisfy this legend. Points of Contention Golden Sands Outpost Head to the eastern side of this outpost and look for a wooden tower with a water pump underneath it. You'll find a skeleton with a long piece of paper leaning up against this tower. interact with it to satisfy this legend. Early Arrivals Cannon Cove Head to Cannon Cove and walk from the main dock forward until you reach a large rock covered in vegetation. You'll find some names carved into the rock and you need to interact with these names. See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Speak No Evil Sanctuary Outpost Head into the Sanctuary Outpost tavern and to the right of the fireplace is a large banner with three monkey heads on it. Interact with this banner. Scruffy Scribe Shark Bait Cove Head to the northern side of Shark Bait Cove and look for a small cave. Inside the cave, you'll find a shark shrine. There's a book in this room on a rock and you need to interact with it to satisfy this legend. May Contain Boom Golden Sands Outpost Head to the Golden Sands Outpost and then head to the backside of the weapon store. You'll find what appears to be the wooden remains of an old wagon or rowboat. The legend can be found here. Big Love in a Small Package Galleon's Grave Outpost Head to the Galleon's Grave Outpost and then head to the Merchant Alliance representative on the dock. Beside them is a wooden crate with a hat on it. Interact with this hat. Putting the Ship in Friendship The Finest Trading Post Head to The Finest Trading Post and look at the shelves behind the shopkeep. You'll see a ship on the bottom shelf. Interact with it. Who's a Good Boy? Galleon's Grave Outpost Head to the Galleon's Grave Outpost and climb the ladders here to the top. Up here, you'll find two chairs and a bowl with bones in it. Interact with this bowl to satisfy this legend. Fool's Gold Cannon Cove Head into the singular cave of Cannon Cove and look for a barrel with a dagger stuck into the top of it. This dagger is the legend so interact with it to satisfy this legend.
